name: TecACM
description: ACM student chapter at Tecnológico de Monterrey. Find events on everything related to computer engineering.

name: HackMTY
description: Latin America's largest student hackathon, hosted at Tecnológico de Monterrey. 2025 season coming soon.

name: RAMcpp
description: Competitive Programming student club at Tecnológico de Monterrey, and hosts for the university's ICPC competitions.
